name: Don't Mess With My Console
description:
In this game all you need to do is to protect your console from your wicked friends and toys which their only goal is to steal your console! Also don't forget to do your homework or your parent will take your console!

We created this game for Funni Jam, with the theme "The game is your friend"!

How to play
  • A and D keys to move to left and right
  • Space to jump on enemies and kill them
  • Q to throw your Awesome weapon
What to do
  • Don't let the enemies come near to your console, or they'll destroy it
  • Don't forget to do your homework
  • And have fun
Acknowledgments

Without all the free assets we used, we couldn't finish this games, so let's shout out to these amazing fellas

  • Freepik
  • Vecteezy

Also these amazing assets from one and only Unity Asset Store

  • 2D characters family
  • 2D room
  • Kenny Pack
  • UI Pack
